title: Brendan Courtney: My pain at seeing dad become a prisoner in his own body
text: Brendan Courtney: My pain at seeing dad become a prisoner in his own body Independent.ie Brendan Courtney has spoken about his pain at seeing his beloved father, Frank, become a prisoner in his own body following a massive stroke. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/brendan-courtney-my-pain-at-seeing-dad-become-a-prisoner-in-his-own-body-35349658.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35349513.ece/53702/AUTOCROP/h342/page16_courtney.jpg Television presenter Brendan Courtney Brendan Courtney has spoken about his pain at seeing his beloved father, Frank, become a prisoner in his own body following a massive stroke.
